TopicTitle: Switched to 'fly' lost a whole planet.

Articles.Content:
Switched to a probe in tracking station, can't target eve, she has no path either, is there a fix, or she gone for good?

(I reloaded, and unset her moon as target, reloaded a save from about 3 hours before, switched to Eve, same thing...)

>![mh0Qb6f.png](http://i.imgur.com/mh0Qb6f.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-27T17:01:49Z" title="07/27/2015 05:01  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 27, 2015</time> by Merit**

Have you tried restarting KSP? Often that will help fix something like this. If that doesn't do it, then please cause it to happen again, then upload your logs.

Cheers,

~Claw

Soooo, turn it off and turn it back on again...

Guess I uninstall a 2nd time, go back to waiting for 'finished' version. 

Cheers.
